span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 同意，赞赏： an expression of approval
【例】 won virtually every accolade that the film world has to offer 赢得了电影界几乎一致的赞赏
【反】 disapprobation 不赞成
【近】 applause, credit, distinction
【考法 2】 v. 赞扬： to praise or honor
【反】 excoriation, criticism, reprobation, castigation, cutting remark, derogation, reproof. denigration, denunciation, swearword 批评，谴责
【记】 源自ac + collar 领子，衣服的脖子部分，奖章挂在领子上
【另】 commodity
